DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate WIC Fresh Start program , theory-driven , web-based nutrition education lesson promote farmer ' market fruit vegetable purchase consumption among woman enrol Special Supplemental Nutrition Program Women , Infants Children ( WIC ) .
DOC.brief_title: Online WIC Nutrition Education Promote Farmers ' Market Fruit Vegetable Purchases Consumption
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate WIC Fresh Start program , theory-driven , web-based nutrition education lesson promote fruit vegetable ( FV ) consumption among woman enrol Special Supplemental Nutrition Program Women , Infants Children ( WIC ) . Designed leverage voucher provide WIC participant FV purchase Farmers ' Market Nutrition Program ( FMNP ) monthly cash value voucher ( CVVs ) redeemable farmer ' market , lesson conceptually ground formative research knowledge , attitude skills influence farmer ' market FV purchase consumption theoretical understanding approach modify . Lesson content delivery primarily short video segment audio output increase accessibility low-literate learner . Informed community-based participatory research approach , WIC participant engage full partner development lesson delivery content ( videos feature WIC participant ) . The set large WIC agency serve three New Jersey county . Separate sample woman recruit participate 1 ) focus group guide lesson content development ( N = 56 participant ) pretesting result content ( N = 52 participant ) , 2 ) cognitive test assess clarity interpretability item response format measure knowledge , attitude skill develop study ( N = 15 ) , 3 ) one-on-one session assess reaction initial version video segment develop lesson ( N = 20 ) , 4 ) outcome evaluation ( N = 744 ) . Stratified base FMNP voucher receipt , participant randomize receive lesson exist online health education . Outcome measure ( administer orally reduce literacy demand response task ) complete pretest ( immediately lesson ) , posttest ( two week lesson ) , 3 6 month posttesting . Short- long-term lesson effect FV intake , FMNP voucher redemption redemption CVVs farmer ' market evaluate . Evidence mediation knowledge , attitude skill lesson effect FV intake voucher redemption , dose-response relationship , user satisfaction lesson also examine .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant postpartum WIC participant Female caregiver infant/child WIC participant Restrictions food intake Classified WIC high risk/requiring individualized nutrition care plan
DOC.keyword: Fruit , vegetable , income , WIC program , farmer ' market
